data.text: @allaboutthewod Except for departing New Zealand are permitted to transit Australia, which pasengers have not been in China, Iran, Korea or Italy in the past 14 days and the transit occurs on the same day and the customer remains airside in the airport. But only applicable until 24MAR - Anna 2/2
@allaboutthewod Hi there. All foreign nationals are not permitted to enter or transit through Australia. - Anna 1/2

@Ramonido Ramonido, as team received a large volume of refund request, it may take longer time as usual, up to 6-8 weeks. You may also DM us with the full name of passenger and eTicket number so we can have a look.  -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Huy29 As team received a large volume of refund request, it may take longer time as usual, up to 6-8 weeks. We appreciate your patience. -Vinci
@ickycousintom You're welcome and thank you for flying with us!

@JLallysmith If you can provide us their full name and eTicket number via  DM, we will be able to verify the details and process refund. Yet, if tickets are purchased with travel agent, this will have to ask travel agent to follow-up. Hope this clarifies. -Vinci (2/2) https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@JLallysmith Hi Janet, may we reiterated that we are indeed offering waivers to passengers which covers travel period from now until 31May2020 if tickets issued on or before 17Mar2020 with us directly. This is already stated in the website that Elsa provided to you earlier. (1/2) https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@EdouardLeng Hi there. We replied you DM. Thank you. - Anna
@rejoicemampuru Hi there. Mind letting us know your eTicket number and full name through PM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @StormchaserUKEU @Gatwick_Airport I'm afraid that it is too early to check flight status for now as situation might change from time to time. We recommend you to check back 4 days prior to departure at https://t.co/N4cAUTOkN4 and keep an eye on our official website at https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr -Vinci
@_abbyhughes Hi Abby, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@jennie96538048 Hi Jennie, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name, email address and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@tlangston1 Ticket cannot be kept open as credit. Currently there is no waiver for Aug flight at this moment, we recommend you to check back later in Jul. -Vinci

@cindywitkow @JLallysmith Due to system limitation, refund charge may be deducted if you cancel ticket online and team will have to review every single case and process the full refund for eligible passengers. You can always DM us with the ticket details and we are happy to have a look. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @ChantelleEvan14 Please share your eTicket no and full name in DM. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@OnlyIain Hi Lain, would you mind to DM us your booking reference -Elsa
8/8 Our teams are working around the clock and assisting you. We thank you for your understanding and continued support, and can’t wait to see you again on our flights soon!

7/8 We will continue to maintain a limited number of flights in April and May to and from key destinations in our network to ensure these vital arteries remain open. For details, please visit https://t.co/sTb8jJJLhf.

6/8 BOOKED ON OUR WEBSITE, APP OR OUR CONTACT CENTRE 
The fastest way to manage your booking, including refunds, is to log in to Manage Booking https://t.co/L0AzF1i2mj.

5/8 BOOKED THROUGH TRAVEL AGENTS OR THIRD PARTY WEBSITES
Please contact them directly to manage your booking. We are unable to process bookings made through a travel agent or third-party website including refunds.

4/8 AFFECTED JOURNEYS
You’ll receive an email from us in the coming days with information on alternative arrangements.

data.text:
3/8 We've updated our refund and rebooking guidelines for all tickets issued before March 17, 2020: https://t.co/rs2RIuidL7.
If you are not travelling with us in the next 72 hours, please do not call our contact centres, as we are prioritising immediate itineraries.
2/8 In these challenging times, we would like to provide more flexible ticketing arrangements so that you can change your itinerary as needed.
